card_text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Chronomaly" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; it loses ATK equal to the Level/Rank of the monster sent to the GY x 200 until the end of this turn. A "Number" Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.$N‚óèThis card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase.$NYou can only use each effect of "Chronomaly Tuspa Rocket" once per turn.
